sect2.title: Layers to Bottom

indexterm.tertiary: Lower selected layers to the bottom of stack

sect2.para: The Layers to Bottom command lowers the selected layers to the bottom of the layer stack. If the selected layers already end at the bottom of the stack, or if there is only one layer, this menu entry is disabled.

listitem.para:
From the main menu through
Layer Stack Layers to Bottom .
By pressing the Shift key and clicking on the down-arrow icon at the bottom of the Layers dialog.
